location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Hinde Pelly, Deputy Military Paymaster General, Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Another separate item (IOR/R/15/1/17, p 122a) is located at the bottom of p. 122a.

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a list of bills from the Bushire Residency that have been passed by the Military Auditor General.
